text.tspan: Expected chances of death from non-communicable diseases, by
The estimated share of 30-year-olds who would die before their 70th birthday from common non-communicable diseases:

any of
cardiovascular disease
, cancer , diabetes , or
chronic respiratory disease
.
Data source: World Health Organization - Global Health Observatory (2025)
Note: Estimates assume that current mortality rates continue and they would not have already died from any other cause of death (e.g.,
